com.chinamobile.android.connectionmanager.manager

类 ReportManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chinamobile.android.connectionmanager.manager.BaseManager
      • com.chinamobile.android.connectionmanager.manager.ReportManager
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CMHttpListener

    public class ReportManager
extends BaseManager
implements CMHttpListener
    the manager to manage report action

    it provide create a report, update report data, send report data to server and receive response from report server

      void exception(java.lang.Exception e, CMRequest request)
      actions that should be taken when a Request object is indicating that the request cannot be carried out due to thrown exceptions.
